channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【How Yelp Built “Yelp Assistant”】Yelp 如何构建“Yelp 助手”
item.description: 【This article walks through what it takes to ship a production-ready AI assistant using Yelp Assistant on business pages as a concrete case study.】本文作为具体案例研究，介绍了如何在业务页面上使用 Yelp Assistant 来发布可投入生产的 AI 助手。

item.title: 【EP201: The Evolution of AI in Software Development】EP201：人工智能在软件开发中的演变
item.description: 【AI has fundamentally changed how engineers code. This shift can be described in three waves.】人工智能从根本上改变了工程师的编码方式。这种转变可以用三个浪潮来描述。

item.title: 【[Subscriber Exclusive] Become an AI Engineer - Cohort 4】[订阅者独家] 成为人工智能工程师 - 第 4 组
item.description: 【Because you’re part of this newsletter community, you get an exclusive discount not available anywhere else.】因为您是该时事通讯社区的一员，所以您可以获得其他地方所没有的独家折扣。

item.title: 【Top Authentication Techniques to Build Secure Applications】构建安全应用程序的顶级身份验证技术
item.description: 【In this article, we’ll explore multiple authentication techniques used in applications and understand their advantages and disadvantages.】在本文中，我们将探讨应用程序中使用的多种身份验证技术，并了解它们的优点和缺点。

item.title: 【A Guide to Effective Prompt Engineering】有效的即时工程指南
item.description: 【In this article, we will explore different prompting approaches, from simple zero-shot instructions to advanced chain-of-thought reasoning.】在本文中，我们将探索不同的提示方法，从简单的零样本指令到高级的思维链推理。

item.title: 【How Grab Built a Vision LLM to Scan Images】Grab 如何构建视觉法学硕士来扫描图像
item.description: 【While powerful proprietary Large Language Models (LLMs) were available, they often failed to adequately understand Southeast Asian languages, produced errors and hallucinations, and suffered from high latency.】虽然强大的专有大型语言模型 (LLM) 可用，但它们常常无法充分理解东南亚语言，产生错误和幻觉，并且存在高延迟。

item.title: 【How Transformers Architecture Powers Modern LLMs】Transformers 架构如何为现代法学硕士提供动力
item.description: 【In this article, we will look at how the transformer architecture works in a step-by-step manner.】在本文中，我们将逐步了解变压器架构的工作原理。

item.title: 【EP200: HTTP/2 over TCP vs HTTP/3 over QUIC】EP200：基于 TCP 的 HTTP/2 与基于 QUIC 的 HTTP/3
item.description: 【HTTP/2 vs HTTP/3 looks like an HTTP upgrade. It’s actually a transport-layer rethink.】HTTP/2 与 HTTP/3 看起来像是 HTTP 的升级。这实际上是传输层的重新思考。

item.title: 【How to Scale An API】如何扩展 API
item.description: 【In this article, we will learn how to scale APIs effectively using different strategies.】在本文中，我们将学习如何使用不同的策略有效地扩展 API。

item.title: 【How to Write High-Performance Code】如何编写高性能代码
item.description: 【This article is about that critical 3%, where we’ll explore how to estimate performance impact, when to measure, what to look for, and practical techniques that work across different programming languages.】本文讨论的是关键的 3%，我们将探讨如何估计性能影响、何时测量、要寻找什么以及跨不同编程语言的实用技术。
